parameters.query:
-- Parse expense using Claude
-- Input: {{ $json.body.text }}
-- Example: "$45 at Whole Foods" or "spent $12.50 on coffee"

SELECT 
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as logged_at,
  '{{ $json.body.text }}' as original_text

parameters.text:
=Parse this expense into structured data. Return ONLY valid JSON with no markdown:

Expense: {{ $json.original_text }}

Extract:
- merchant_name (string)
- amount (number, always positive)
- category (one of: grocery, restaurant, transport, utilities, entertainment, health, shopping, other)
- is_grocery (boolean)
- is_restaurant (boolean)
- notes (string, any extra details)

JSON only:

parameters.query:
-- Get today's totals
SELECT 
  COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) as total_spent,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN is_grocery THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) as grocery_spent,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN is_restaurant THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) as eating_out_spent,
  COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN category = '{{ $json.category }}' THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) as category_spent
FROM finance.transactions
WHERE date = CURRENT_DATE
